title: Dream Your Life
description: Going forth in an ever expanding reality, Acoustic Funambulist's journey takes the turns of his own artistry, pushing beyond the limits of the known universe.In a wet and jazzy underworld, the equilibrist is, in this eleventh episode, immersed and taken for a dream.Already available:- The hair of the comet- Five minutes to Doomsday- Perpetual emotion- The Uneventful Galaxy- The pragmatic hitchhiker- Messy Christmas- The Reincarnation Office- Pole shifts- Be God to Yourself- The invisible layer
author: Jean-Yves Crozier
